extension.name: EasyBlog Showcase
extension.author: StackIdeas
extension.copyright: Copyright 2009 - 2011 Stack Ideas. All rights reserved.
extension.description: Displays featured or lastest blogs listing in a slider module

param.name: routingtype
param.label: Routing Type
param.description: Choose the routing type when generate blog post link

param.name: menuitemid
param.label: Use Menu Item
param.description: Select menu item if you have choose to use 'menu item' as routing type

param.name: catid
param.label: Category
param.description: Please select your EasyBlog category. To include multiple categories, separate values by a comma

param.name: count
param.label: Count
param.description: The number of items to display (set it to 0 if post limiting if not required).

param.name: textlimit
param.label: Text limit
param.description: Set the number of maximum characters to be shown in the module.

param.name: showposttype
param.label: Show Posts
param.description: Select to whether display featured or latest post.

param.name: showratings
param.label: Show Ratings
param.description: Show or hide the rating for the post

param.name: contentfrom
param.label: Use Content from
param.description: Where should the module fetch the content from

param.name: showreadmore
param.label: Show Readmore
param.description: Show or hide the read more link for the post

param.name: autoshuffle
param.label: Randomize items
param.description: If enabled, blog posts will be randomized automatically

param.name: autorotate_seconds
param.label: Auto rotating time
param.description: Set the number of seconds before the auto rotation kicks in

param.name: autorotate
param.label: Auto rotate slides
param.description: If enabled, module will automatically slide through each items

param.name: authoravatar
param.label: Show Author Avatar
param.description: Show or hide the author's avatar for the post

param.name: contentauthor
param.label: Show Author
param.description: Show or hide the author for the post

param.name: contentdate
param.label: Show Date
param.description: Show or hide the article date for the post

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached
